testsuite.name: 4group

testcase.name: GROUPS: User should get an error if groupname is less than 3 characters
GROUPS: User should get an error if groupname is more than 15 characters
GROUPS: User should get an error if description is less than 15 characters
GROUPS: User should get an error if description is more than 45 characters
GROUPS: User should get an error if groupname contain invalid characters
GROUPS: It should create a new group with valid inputs
GROUPS: User should get an error if groupname already exist
GROUPS: User should be able to view the group message board
GROUPS: User should be able to send a new group message
GROUPS: User should see a members list containing group creator
GROUPS: User should be able to search for other registered users
